title.rendered: Cover vs Keepsafe: Top Photo Vault

content.rendered:
What’s better for hiding secret & private photos and videos? Keepsafe or Cover? Both photo vault apps have their pros, but in this article, we’ll discuss everything you need to know before you install a dedicated photo & video vault of your own.  

Keepsafe Photo Vault

Keepsafe Photo Vault is a secret photo vault app that’s great for getting the job done. The app provides a straight-forward and extremely safe way to hide any explicit photos or videos on your Android device. It’s used by over 50 million people and is by far one of the best photo vaults on the mobile market. 

  • Secure PIN, pattern, and fingerprint passcodes
  • Sync photos or videos across devices 
  • Backup photos & videos for easy recovery
  • Face-down auto lock 
  • Shared Albums  
  • No Show! Keepsafe also doesn’t show up in your recently used apps list!

Cover Automatically Hide Photos & Videos

Cover is an all-in-one solution for all of your private photo & video needs. While developing Cover, we made sure to pack the app with a ton of amazing features that make the app a one-stop-shop for all of your photo privacy needs. Cover has just about every single security feature and will ensure no explicit content is ever “publicly” on your device. Here are the features that set Cover apart from secret calculator apps: 

Real-time Protection: What makes Cover unique is it’s Real-time Protection. With this feature, your device will constantly be on the lookout for explicit content. Once it’s detected, it will automatically be moved to your private vault.

Smart Notifications: Whenever explicit content is caught by Cover’s AI, you’ll be subtly notified. It’s discreet notifications make it the perfect photo vault to use, especially if you find yourself surrounded by many people everyday.

Messaging Blocking: In addition to being a photo vault, Cover also monitors your messages for any incoming explicit photos. The app will block any nude photos or videos that are sent to you. 

Password Protected: Cover is passcode protected like most calculator apps, but it goes the extra step by offering a fingerprint password!

Encrypted: Cover is end-to-end encrypted. Meaning the only person who can view your content – is you.

Cover is the ultimate photo & video vault app that addresses all of your privacy needs. The app is available on the Google Play store today. The most secure photo gallery is waiting for you!

Download Cover Today!
